mapper.update: update doc_order_pdd set status = #{status}, fail_reason = #{reason} where id = #{id}
update doc_order_pdd set gemini_total_price = #{geminiTotalPrice}, tax_fcy = #{taxFcy} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select from doc_order_pdd
order by create_time desc
